articles.title: Draft US-Pacific declaration shows diplomatic wrangling over security, climate change - ABC News
articles.description: A draft joint declaration being negotiated by the United States and Pacific Island countries outlines intensifying American security cooperation with the region and declares climate change is the "greatest existential threat" to the Pacific.
